title-group.article-title: An Analysis of the Discontinuous Galerkin Method for a Scalar Hyperbolic Equation

abstract.p: We prove $L_p$ stability and error estimates for the discontinuous Galerkin method when applied to a scalar linear hyperbolic equation on a convex polygonal plane domain. Using finite element analysis techniques, we obtain $L_2$ estimates that are valid on an arbitrary locally regular triangulation of the domain and for an arbitrary degree of polynomials. $L_p$ estimates for $p \neq 2$ are restricted to either a uniform or piecewise uniform triangulation and to polynomials of not higher than first degree. The latter estimates are proved by combining finite difference and finite element analysis techniques.
